text: Joe Sinnott (; October 16, 1926 â€“ June 25, 2020) was an American comic book artist. He was best known for his long career with Marvel Comics' Fantastic Four, from 1965 to 1981. During his 60 years with Marvel, he worked on The Avengers, The Defenders and Thor. Sinnott was born in Saugerties, New York. Sinnott died on June 25, 2020 in Saugerties at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Joe Sinnott at the Lambiek Comiclopedia. . *Interview at Fantastic Four Headquarters Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American comics artists Category:Artists from New York (state)
title: Joe Sinnott
